metadata.title: CVE-2024-27913 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: ospf_te_parse_te in ospfd/ospf_te.c in FRRouting (FRR) through 9.1 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (ospfd daemon crash) via amalformed OSPF LSA packet, because of an attempted access to a missingattribute field.

criterions.comment: frr package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
quagga package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
